# localIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A locally unique identifier for the item the metadata represents.

## Declaration

```swift
var localIdentifier: SWLocalCollaborationIdentifier { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this identifier to uniquely identify this metadata before the system creates a [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYouCore/SWCollaborationMetadata/collaborationIdentifier].

## Accessing metadata attributes

- **collaborationIdentifier**: A globally unique identifier that the app hosting the collaboration provides.
- **defaultShareOptions**: The collaboration options that the content supports.
- **initiatorHandle**: The handle of the person who initiates the collaboration.
- **initiatorNameComponents**: The name of the person who initiates the collaboration.
- **title**: The title of the content.
- **userSelectedShareOptions**: The selected collaboration options from the person who sends the invitation.
